price: 29. „Taigi ženkite pro Pragaro vartus, gyventi ten, ir iš tiesų, kokia bloga buveinė bus išpuikėliams.“
arabic: فَٱدۡخُلُوٓاْ أَبۡوَٰبَ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۖ فَلَبِئۡسَ مَثۡوَى ٱلۡمُتَكَبِّرِينَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fa-ud'khulū abwāba jahannama khālidīna fīhā falabi'sa mathwā al-mutakabirīna
